text: Health Care for Women International is a monthly peer-reviewed healthcare journal covering health care and related topics that concern women around the globe. It is the official journal for Women's Health Issues and it is published by Taylor & Francis. Its editor-in-chief is Eleanor Krassen Covan (University of North Carolina at Wilmington). == History == The journal was originally titled Issues in Health Care of Women (1978–1983). The editor-in- chief from 1983 to 2001 was Phyllis Stern (University of Pennsylvania School of Nursing). == Abstracting and indexing == According to the Journal Citation Reports, the journal has a 2015 impact factor of 0.950, ranking it 20th out of 40 journals in the category "Women's Studies" and 115th out of 153 journals in the category "Public, Environmental & Occupational Health". == See also == * List of women's studies journals == References == == External links == * * International Council on Women's Health Issues (ICOWHI) Category:Monthly journals Category:Publications established in 1978 Category:Routledge academic journals Category:Women's health Category:Women's studies journals Category:Works about midwifery
title: Health Care for Women International
